entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
